title: Drawing, "Sketches from Bernese Alps, Switzerland", September 3, 1868
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Delicious / bt sienna wood / and Raw sienna / ..... [?] purple;captioned at bottom center: Rock at bed of stream / wild precipice; and again at lower right:  grey / slate / shiny / brown / grey.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite at ?:  yel [low] streaks / rich / sienna brown; and again over the houses: covered with chips black / stone roof yel grey; and again at lower right:  near Bel Alp / [and the date].
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of two groups of wooden mountain sheds at top; oblique view of two houses with a shed behind them at left center; a rock in scale at lower center; and a slope drawn vertically at lower right. 
Verso:  Oblique horizontal view of two mountain houses.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from Bernese Alps, Switzerland", September 3, 1868.
September 3, 1868. Graphite on light gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-165.
